text: Brendan Francis Boyle (born February 6, 1977) is an American Democratic politician who has been a member of the United States House of Representatives, representing a district in the Philadelphia area since 2015. Since January 2023, he has been a Ranking Member of United States House Committee on the Budget. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Brendan Boyle official U.S. House website * Brendan Boyle for Congress * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Pennsylvania Category:Politicians from Philadelphia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Brendan Boyle
